name: FastText Word-Based Classifier Processor
description: This classifier looks at vectors word-by-word and sees if there is a close-enough overlap between one or more candidate set words and the sentence's words.

parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: Name of the model to be applied. If a model with this name cannot be found, the data will go through unchanged.

parameters.name: data_field
parameters.description: The field the data resides in. Data can be textual (String) or Seq[String].

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: How many of the top classes to return.

parameters.name: flatten
parameters.description: If set, returns just the best scoring class.

parameters.name: cutoff
parameters.description: If set, only returns labels with a score higher than or equal to the cutoff. If no scores succeed, will return label -1 with score 0.0.

parameters.name: candidate_field
parameters.description: If set, this field in the DP must contain the candidate sets (as JSON, Seq[Seq[String]] or a String that is JSON). This will overwrite any values in the candidates list entered below.
The candidate word (partially) defining this class.
